sections.content: Welcome to Findash. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of the Findash financial dashboard application (the "App") operated by Third Origin L.L.C-FZ ("we," "our," or "us"). By accessing or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

sections.title: IMPORTANT FINANCIAL DISCLAIMER
sections.content:
Findash provides INFORMATIONAL TOOLS ONLY and is NOT a substitute for professional financial advice. The statistics, insights, and AI-generated explanations provided by the App are for informational purposes only.

We are NOT financial advisors, accountants, or tax professionals. The App does not provide investment advice, tax advice, or recommendations on financial decisions.

ALWAYS consult with a qualified financial professional before making significant financial decisions. We are not responsible for any financial outcomes resulting from your use of this App.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content:
By creating an account or using the App, you confirm that you:

• Are at least 18 years of age
• Have read and understood these Terms
• Agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy
• Understand that Findash does not provide financial advice
• Have the authority to connect your YNAB account

sections.title: 2. Description of Service
sections.content:
Findash is a financial dashboard that integrates with YNAB (You Need A Budget) to provide:

• Visual dashboards of your income, expenses, and savings
• Spending breakdowns by category
• Monthly trend analysis
• Net worth tracking
• Server-side insights (spending anomalies, budget alerts)
• AI-powered explanations of your financial data

The App requires a valid YNAB account and your explicit authorization to access your financial data.

sections.title: 3. YNAB Integration
sections.content:
• You must have a valid YNAB account to use Findash
• You authorize us to access your YNAB data through OAuth
• We sync and cache your data to provide dashboard functionality
• You can revoke access at any time through your YNAB account settings
• We are not affiliated with YNAB; Findash is an independent third-party application
• YNAB's terms of service and privacy policy also apply to your use of their service

sections.title: 4. Account Terms
sections.content:
• Your account is created through YNAB OAuth authentication
• You are responsible for maintaining the security of your YNAB credentials
• You must not share your account access with others
• You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access
• We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms

sections.title: 5. Data Accuracy
sections.content:
• Financial data displayed is synced from YNAB and reflects what you have entered there
• We do not verify the accuracy of data imported from YNAB
• Statistics and calculations are based on synced data and may not reflect real-time changes
• AI-generated insights are for informational purposes and may contain errors
• You are responsible for verifying any information before making financial decisions

sections.title: 6. User Responsibilities
sections.content:
You agree NOT to:

• Use the App for any illegal purpose
• Attempt to circumvent security measures
• Submit false or misleading information
• Use automated systems to access the App without permission
• Reverse engineer or attempt to extract the App's source code
• Use the App to harm, harass, or mislead others
• Share, sell, or distribute your account access

sections.title: 7. Intellectual Property
sections.content:
• The App, including its design, features, and content, is owned by Third Origin L.L.C-FZ
• You may not copy, modify, or distribute our proprietary content
• AI-generated explanations are provided for your personal use only
• Your financial data remains yours; we claim no ownership over it

sections.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
sections.content:
TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW:

• The App is provided "AS IS" without warranties of any kind
• We do not guarantee the accuracy of calculations, statistics, or AI insights
• We are not liable for any financial decisions or outcomes based on App data
• We are not liable for data loss, service interruptions, or YNAB API changes
• We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
• Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the App in the past 12 months

sections.title: 9. Indemnification
sections.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Third Origin L.L.C-FZ, its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your use of the App, violation of these Terms, or any financial decisions you make.

sections.title: 10. Termination
sections.content:
• You may disconnect your YNAB account and stop using the App at any time
• We may suspend or terminate your access for Terms violations
• Upon termination, your right to use the App ceases immediately
• You can request deletion of your cached data
• Provisions that by nature should survive will remain in effect

sections.title: 11. Changes to Terms
sections.content: We may modify these Terms at any time. Material changes will be communicated through the App or via email. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

sections.title: 12. Governing Law
sections.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Dubai, UAE.

sections.title: 13. Contact Us
sections.content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
